name: シムベリン・専用
description: Grants allies within 2 spaces Atk+3 during combat. Grants Atk/Res+5 during combat if within 2 spaces of a flying ally.
周囲２マスの味方は、戦闘中、攻撃 +3　飛行の味方が２マス以内にいる時、戦闘中、自身の攻撃、魔防 +5

name: 攻撃
description: Grants allies within 2 spaces Atk+3 during combat.
周囲２マスの味方は、戦闘中、攻撃 +3

name: 速さ
description: Grants allies within 2 spaces Atk+3 during combat.
周囲２マスの味方は、戦闘中、攻撃 +3

name: 守備
description: Grants allies within 2 spaces Atk+3 during combat.
周囲２マスの味方は、戦闘中、攻撃 +3

name: 魔防
description: Grants allies within 2 spaces Atk+3 during combat.
周囲２マスの味方は、戦闘中、攻撃 +3

name: パルティア・専用
description: If foe uses magic, damage from first attack received by unit during combat reduced by 30%. Grants Atk+6 during combat if foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff.
敵が魔法の時、戦闘中、最初に受けた攻撃のダメージを 30% 軽減　敵が弓、暗器、魔法、杖の時、戦闘中、攻撃 +6

name: 速さ
description: After combat, inflicts Def/Res-6 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions. Also grants Def/Res+6 to unit and allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn.
戦闘後、敵の周囲２マスの敵の攻撃、速さ、守備、魔防 -6 (敵の次回行動終了まで) 戦闘後、自分と、その周囲２マスの敵の守備、魔防 +6 (1 ターン)

name: 守備
description: After combat, inflicts Def/Res-6 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions. Also grants Def/Res+6 to unit and allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn.
戦闘後、敵の周囲２マスの敵の攻撃、速さ、守備、魔防 -6 (敵の次回行動終了まで) 戦闘後、自分と、その周囲２マスの敵の守備、魔防 +6 (1 ターン)

description: After combat, inflicts Def/Res-6 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions. Also grants Def/Res+6 to unit and allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn.
戦闘後、敵の周囲２マスの敵の攻撃、速さ、守備、魔防 -6 (敵の次回行動終了まで) 戦闘後、自分と、その周囲２マスの敵の守備、魔防 +6 (1 ターン)

name: 重装無効化
description: If in combat against an armored foe, nullifies foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.
敵が重装の時、戦闘中、敵の強化の + を無効にする (無効になるのは鼓舞や応援等の + 効果)
prereq: アーマーキラー鍛+,貫きの槍鍛+,ハンマー鍛+

name: 騎馬無効化
description: If in combat against a cavalry foe, nullifies foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.
敵が騎馬の時、戦闘中、敵の強化の + を無効にする (無効になるのは鼓舞や応援等の + 効果)

name: 神罰
description: Damage from unit's staff will be calculated the same as other weapons.
杖は他の武器同様のダメージ計算になる
prereq: アブソーブ+,フィアー+,スロウ+,グラビティ+,ペイン+,パニック+,キャンドル+

name: 幻惑
description: The enemy cannot counterattack.
敵は反撃不可
prereq: アブソーブ+,フィアー+,スロウ+,グラビティ+,ペイン+,パニック+,キャンドル+

name: 攻撃
description: If foe's Range = 2, damage calculated using the lower of foe's Def or Res.
射程２の敵に、敵の守備か魔防の低い方でダメージ計算
prereq: 灼熱のブレス+,雷のブレス+

description: If foe's Range = 2, damage calculated using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

name: 魔防
description: After combat, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit and allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. If foe's Range = 2, damage calculated using the lower of foe's Def or Res.
戦闘後、自分とその周囲２マスの味方の攻撃、速さ、守備、魔防 +5 (1ターン) 射程２の敵に、敵の守備か魔防の低い方でダメージ計算

name: 攻撃
description: After combat, inflicts Atk/Spd-7 to target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions. If foe's Range = 2, damage calculated using the lower of foe's Def or Res.
戦闘後、敵と、その周囲２マスの敵の攻撃、速さ -7 (敵の次回行動終了まで) 射程 2 の敵に、敵の守備か魔防の低い方でダメージ計算
